name: Mvc-buttons
tagline: Simple example(s) demonstrating how to implement model-view-controller
body: # Model View Controller [Examples] Simple lightweight examples showing how to code up the Model View Controller software architectural pattern. Utilises the Observer Design Pattern (Java's Observer/Observable classes from the util package) Nothing complicated. Just pure simple java code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
